document_data.name: Waterskin
document_data.mainbody: Magic]] waterskins existed throughout the [[Realms]], particularly in Maztica.
document_data.Powers: [[Magic]] waterskins existed throughout the [[Realms]], particularly in Maztica.
document_data.Notable Waterskins:
* A notable magical waterskin was the Maztican ''[[waterskin of pouring]]''. This magic feathered waterskin was always full and could pour out a gallon of water every minute.

* The ''[[decanter of salt water]]'', which could be found in [[Undermountain]], could turn any liquid poured into it into salt water.
document_data.Notable Owners: * [[Pikel Bouldershoulder]] carried a waterskin that had a nozzle attached to it; he loved to fill it with [[holy water]] and squirt [[undead]].
